name: Custom Design Skateboard
description:
Ever wanted your own graphics on a skateboard, well you came to the right place get your custom designed skateboards here. 

Whether your a skateboarder or not these boards are for anyone and everyone, To skate or even for show and also makes a great alternative picture for a wall or an over the door hanger. 

And for the skateboarder in you all boards are made from 100% canadian maple and come in a range of different sizes.

Before buying a skateboard please email images and a written statement of your ideas or design, or call us and we will personally talk about your ideas for your custom skateboard graphics.

Prices start from £40 for 2 colours and is an extra £5 for every extra colour (example - skateboard with 5 colours in total = £55)

Optional extras:-
Gloss Coat + £5
Jessups Griptape + £5

once we have finalised your design and you are happy with it we will send you a paypal bill and once payment has been received we will start work on your skateboard.

Contact directly at lee@deckchairskateboards.co.uk

For more custom skateboard examples please visit our facebook page for many more designs.

LIMITED STOCK AVAILABLE PLEASE EMAIL FIRST BEFORE BUYING!!!

name: DeckChair Sand Castle
description:
DeckChair Sand Castle

Hand spray painted design's every single skateboard is a one off even though it has the same design there may be slight changes.

Skateboard may be very slightly different to the board you receive.

Skateboard Sizes - 7.5, 7.75

Dont forget skaters your going to need some griptape found in the skateboard hardware section, and we can even grip it for you.
